author: 懐かしのゲーム音楽

text: Earthbound's varied soundtrack and just how unique it is, especially hearing it back then, are some of the reasons why this game has my favorite music of all time. This techno-ish battle theme is a perfect example. Listening to this after something like Onett's theme shows the variety.
author: SupraDarky

text: I could not agree more with you, Gabe.  The sheer amount of variety in this game's soundtrack is a marvel to behold; and this was back in 1995!  That variety is why it is my favorite soundtrack of all time.  When i listened to this soundtrack for the first time a couple years ago, i did not know what i was getting into.  I am so glad that I got to listen to this game's soundtrack.  It has all of the keys that i look for in a good RPG soundtrack: pleasant town themes, varied battle themes (including boss themes), and music that fills in the gaps.  All of these keys come together to make an extremely memorable soundtrack.
author: Eric C.

text: @Eric C. Did you mention this game's soundtrack ?
author: Aganhim

text: Yes, i mentioned Earthbound's soundtrack in my comment.  Or are you just pulling my leg?
author: Eric C.

text: Just kidding about the number of times you used the word soundtrack, no hard feelings. And I agree with you, it's definitely one of the best I've heard !
author: Aganhim

text: It's all good.  At least we agree that Earthbound's soundtrack is really good.  Still have yet to play the game, but I will someday that's for sure.
author: Eric C.

text: Same here ! There so many great games I've not played yet...
